snippet: An activist has posted a series of videos shedding light on the destructive force of the Syrian government's military crackdown in Homs.
abstract: An activist has posted a series of videos shedding light on the destructive force of the Syrian government's military crackdown in Homs.
lead_paragraph: As new videos shed light on the destructive force of the Syrian government's military crackdown in Homs and other restive locales, the State Department on Monday said that "the deteriorating security situation" had forced it to suspend operations at the American Embassy in Damascus.

headline.main: Activist's Videos Tell of Syrian Carnage
